name: batch-pr-pre-commit-fixes
description: Systematically fix multiple failing PRs with pre-commit hook auto-fix issues
triggers: files were modified by this hook
key_learnings: Check git status after pre-commit to see what changed
Use specific commit messages mentioning actual fixes
Complete each PR sequentially before moving to next
Verify CI is running (pending) before moving on
Most common issue: MD032 (blank lines after list headings)
failed_attempts: Running pre-commit without checking what changed
Trying to run all PRs in parallel
